**Welcome to the Opalcrest Discord Server!**

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

**What is Opalcrest?**

Opalcrest is a safe and cosy community on the internet made by <@263469012724219904> and <@241126463904940032>.

The server is based on an interactive magical fantasy world where you can participate in entertaining events, communicate with friendly people and play as a unique character. In this world, you are a student of the school called Opencrest.

> *To continue, please head over to Chapter 1.*

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

**Chapter 1**

Upon arriving at the school grounds, the groundskeeper ushered you and your fellow students to an enormous empty lantern-lit hall.

In a single file, you stop below a limestone archway. You hear an overbearing voice saying, "Those uniforms look a bit dull. Best if we get you all sorted in a house-ay?". Many curious whispers muttered around you.

As you shuffle to the front, you see a wrinkled man with long ashen hair holding a blued glowing book. Once it's your turn, he smiles and asks you to **hold onto the book.**

> *Press the button "Hold onto the book"*

introduction.title: The blued book glows intensely
introduction.desc:
You close your eyes. You feel a warm yet soft breeze airbrushing your eyebrows.

Moments later, you hear someone talk. The voice did not sound like a human but rather something celestial. 

"So you've come to be sorted into a house. Suppose I'll ask you a few questions. Think deeply now. Your answer must be a truthful reflection of yourself. Are you ready?." the celestial being said calmly and asked.
